alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 1:56PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...FREEZING RAIN WILL AFFECT FAR NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON COUNTY... Freezing rain will produce result in an ice accumulation of a few hundredths of an inch across far northwestern Jefferson County this afternoon. Temperatures will rise above freezing through 330 PM EST. Locations impacted include... Clayton, Wellesley Island State Park, Cedar Point State Park, Redwood, Kring Point State Park, Alexandria Bay, Cape Vincent, Chaumont, Three Mile Bay, Millen Bay, Grindstone, Fishers Landing, La Fargeville, Plessis, Depauville and Muskellunge Lake. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 50 and 52. The freezing rain may quickly coat roadways with a thin layer of ice that may be undetectable. Please use extreme caution, especially on bridges, overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly.
